## FileContainer.write() method

Write file contents as a string

Signature:

```typescript
write(key: string, content: string): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| key       | string |             |
| content   | string |             |

Returns:

void

## Example

```js
fsInstance.write("some/file.md", "string contens");
```
